div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1426 Asia Minor, southern, 1963 Burial: c. 210-200 B.C. Contents: 120+ AR Alexander III: 16 late post. tetradr. (Chios 1, Aspendus 5, Perge 7, Aradus 1, unc. mints 2) Antigonus Gonatas: 9 tetradr. Lysimachus: 8 lifetime tetradr. (Cius 1, Lampsacus 3, Pergamum 3, Mag- nesia 1) Seleucus I: 1 tetradr. (Pergamum) Disposition: dispersed Boehringer, Zur Chronologie, pp. 155-7, illus.
